segments.text: The portions here are man sized . We usually end up taking half of the meal home with us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everything looks so good . Is there anything in particular that you recommend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , sis . You know me , if I don't like everything on the menu , I don't go back to the restaurant !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So you're saying I can't go wrong with anything I order ? In that case ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait , you love salmon , don't you ? They have the best salmon pasta .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds really good ! Does it come with a soup ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Soup and bread and salad bar ! I'm telling you , these people know how to keep you coming back !
segments.speaker: S1
